api/FCA.VisualElements.BaseVisualElement.title: Class BaseVisualElementWithCallback<T> | VisualElementsLibrary Documentation
api/FCA.VisualElements.BaseVisualElement.keywords: Class BaseVisualElementWithCallback<T> Base class for VisualElements that have a value and send a change event when the value is changed. Use this to avoid boiletplate code for sending change events. Inheritance Object BaseVisualElementWithCallback<T> FoldoutTitle Implements INotifyValueChanged <T> Namespace : FCA.VisualElements Assembly : cs.temp.dll.dll Syntax public abstract class BaseVisualElementWithCallback<T> : UnityEngine.UIElements.VisualElement Type Parameters Name Description T Could be any type Fields _value The protected value that is used to store the value of the element. Declaration protected T _value Field Value Type Description T Properties value The value that is stored in the element. Trigger a change event when set. Declaration public T value { get; set; } Property Value Type Description T Methods SetValueWithoutNotify(T) Set the contained value without sending a change event. Declaration public void SetValueWithoutNotify(T newValue) Parameters Type Name Description T newValue The new value of the element Implements INotifyValueChanged<>

index.html.keywords: com.fca.fca-visual-elements-library Your package description here. Installation To install this package, follow the instructions below: Open Unity. Go to Window > Package Manager. Click on the "+" button at the top left of the window. Choose "Add package from disk...". Select the package.json file in the root of this repository.
